page.title: 05GOWY VALLEY HOUSING
page.content: The old village of Guilden Sutton with a small number of Pre 1900 houses,Post war ribbon development & a small council estate has been surrounded by pleasant open planned estates built in 1970's, mainly detached 4 bedroomed houses. Great Barrow is an equal mixture of pre 1939 housing & post war with some modern building, there is a small council estate which is well integrated. Littleton has some fine individual Edwardian & inter war houses built on the A51, behind these are smaller units built since the 1960's and some 1920's now modernised, there is also a small council estate. All council houses built in the 1950's many now privately owned. A small proportion of houses are let, often to Professional workers from overseas.
